title: Another one?
content: pffuf, another page to fill out? no. There is much [better places](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109113219/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Typography) to go to read interesting things.
author: jfp

comments.content:
To the Frenchman in the zoo, Madeline cried, ‘poo poo’. =)

Surely you can support a more focused wiki?

hey  
im stuck. i need to no graphic designers and typographers of the 1940s do u no ne ?

It think you need to replace your keyboard first…

Seriously: Try starting a new thread in General Discussion, and I’m sure you’ll get a good response.

hhp
I think we do need another wiki, that wiki can now serve as the sterile version.
